channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: What happened to Apple's legendary attention to detail?
item.description:
Click this ironic notification popup. So if you're trying to search for something, you first have to search for the search bar itself. Alright perhaps reduced transparency broke some things.

Read more

item.title: Show HN: OpenSnowcat – A fork of Snowplow to keep open analytics alive
item.description:
0 License, fully compatible with Snowplow and Segment SDKs. Integrate with cloud services that simplify managing the platform and running cost-efficiently and reliably at scale. Compatible with Snowplow and other SDKs so that existing implementations can continue to drive value and seamless portability from and to Snowplow.

Read more

item.title: US probes Waymo robotaxis over school bus safety
item.description:
FILE PHOTO: A Waymo driverless vehicle is pictured in the traffic, in downtown Los AngelesBy David Shepardson and Akash SriramWASHINGTON (Reuters) -The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it has opened a preliminary investigation into about 2,000 Waymo self-driving vehicles after reports that the company's robotaxis may have failed to follow traffic safety laws around a stopped school bus. The report said the Waymo vehicle initially stopped then maneuvered around the bus, passing the extended stop arm while students were disembarking. Waymo has said its robotaxi fleet numbers more than 1,500 vehicles operating across major U.

Read more

The Muscular Compassion of "Paper Girl"
item.description:
Many lives have been ravaged by drug addiction and incarceration. Silas meets Macy at a crucial point in his life. Macy worries he may never graduate.

item.title: Expanding Our Use of Google Cloud TPUs and Services
item.description:
This expansion will help us serve this rapidly growing customer demand. This multi-platform approach ensures we can continue advancing Claude's capabilities while maintaining strong partnerships across the industry. Anthropic will continue to invest in additional compute capacity to ensure our models and capabilities remain at the frontier.
